title: Are we not able to gift a friend chromas?
body: It's not an option in the shop. Why?

replies.body:
Since I don't work on the teams that decide what's put on the store and what's not, I can't give you a specific answer. While Gifting Chromas isn't something that's a thing right now, I'd check in on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any announcement if that happens to change.

Please let me know if you have any other questions.
